name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程著重於: (1)藉由科技性文章的閱讀來幫助非理工背景之學生了解一般科技性文章之語法、文體與結構組織，(2)幫助學生熟悉技術報告以及科技論文之撰寫。
schedule:
Week 1 Course orientation
Week 2 Writing Paragraphs/Essays
Week 3 What is Technical Writing?
Week 4 Writing General-to-specific texts / Data Collection
Week 5 Progress and Periodic Reports, Science Lab Reports
Week 6 Writing Introduction (proposal of topic for term paper)
Week 7 Writing Introduction / writing summaries
Week 8 NTUT APPLINGX
Week 9 Library Lecture
Week 10 Writing Introduction; Problem-Solving
Week 11 Method (presentation of relevant literature)
Week 12 MAterials / Document Design and Visual Aids
Week 13 Informal Proposals; Formal Proposals
Week 14 Writing Results / Data Commentary
Week 15 Writing Discussion
Week 16 Writing Abstract
Week 17 Oral presentations
Week 18 Final presentations/projects due
scorePolicy:
Homework, exercises, and class discussions 40%
Oral presentations 30%
Final paper (Formal proposal) 30%
Attendance: one-point deduction for every hour of absence
